Body:
data_container = DataContainer(current_ids=[str(i) for i in range(100)],
    data_inputs=np.array(list(range(100))), expected_outputs=np.array(list(
    range(100, 200))))
batches = []
for b in data_container.convolved_1d(stride=10, kernel_size=10):
    batches.append(b)
for i, batch in enumerate(batches):
    assert np.array_equal(np.array(batch.data_inputs), np.array(list(range(
        i * 10, i * 10 + 10))))
    assert np.array_equal(np.array(batch.expected_outputs), np.array(list(
        range(i * 10 + 100, i * 10 + 100 + 10))))
